subject: Run CodeRabbit review
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Run CodeRabbit code review on the changes after implementation is complete.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] CodeRabbit review completed

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coderabbit:review`

**Verification:**
- Type: manual-check
- Command: Run `/coderabbit:review`
- Expected: Review completes with findings documented

learnings: CodeRabbit returned zero findings across three review modes (default, --base main, --base main --type committed)
